page.title: 10RELIGION.
page.content: Most of the people in our area are members of the Church of England, Methodists or Roman Catholics. There is also a Christian Fellowship in Whickham. There is a Church of England school in Whickham(Whickham Parochial), and also a Catholic school(St.Mary's). The churches in the area help to run a lot of activities which people of all ages can take part in.For instance,the Church of England runs a Sunday School,a Youth Club called the "Monday Mob",the Mothers'Union, and also helps to run a Day Care Centre for elderly people. There are very few people who follow other religions in our area and we do not think there are any other places of worship such as temples or mosques.
